Package exercise_1

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Exercise_1
    Tasks 1) Implement the Point class 2) Implement a constructor a toString method and a main method in Point, so that you can a) run it b) an object on the command line 3) Add a distance function 4) Print the distance between Point(1,1) and Point(4,5)(should be 5, right?) 5) Create both versions (static and non-static of the distance function) 6) Optional: add methods to move the point some distance, mirror it at the origin, mirror it at some axis
    Point
    Point class has been implemented with various methods
